review: This started up and worked fairly easily the first two times and then NOTHING!!!!  I tried re-installing it twice and it was choppy and dropped off.  Don't buy it or any Google OS products until they get their act together.  I also have a chromebook and there aren't ANY tech people to help over the phone or via e-mail/web if you have a problem.
author: heather higgins

review: First things first, the package arrived on time with no damage.I liked the box it came in and the included accessories are great. Very small and portable. Was easy to setup the first time but when I tried to set it up at another house I was confused because I couldn't get it to work for awhile. I eventually figured it out on my own(searching online didn't help)and I think I got the hang of it now. So far I have only used my I-pod touch 4g and my mothers smart phone and both work without a problem.Netflix works well with this but a huge fault is that you cannot queue up movies or tv episodes like you can queue up videos with youtube. Quickly becomes an annoyance. Not sure if it's a problem Netflix must fix or Google. I would give this 5 stars if it supported more apps.
author: Tanner

review: I know some of you people love it, but read this before you buy this product. I choose this rating because I am a technology geek. My family is not into technology like I am. I couldn't set this up. I have a windows phone 8, windows 8 tablet, ipad 2, iPhone 5, and a laptop. I couldn't use my windows products, including the laptop. I didn't try the iPhone, because it was dead. On the Ipad, I got as far as being able to see the video on screen, but not being able to hear it. Also it is deceiving, there are cords people, it isn't what it looks like in the commercials! Tre are wires for your tv and an outlet. I would recommend this product to absolutely no one. THINK TWICE  BEFORE YOU WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS, I AM SENDING IT BACK IMMEDIATLEY!
